means: 健谈的，多嘴的，喜欢说话的

sentence.Network_en: He didn't want company, talkative or otherwise.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不想跟人搭伴，不管这个伴儿是否健谈。

sentence.Network_en: He's not very talkative, is he?
He is talkative when he has a few drinks under his belt.
sentence.Network_cn: 他几杯酒下肚话就多了.

entry.tran: 爱说话的;话多的;健谈的
entry.def: Someone who is talkative talks a lot.

example.ex: He suddenly became very talkative, his face slightly flushed, his eyes much brighter.
example.tran: 他的话突然多了起来，脸颊微微泛红，双眼明亮许多。

sentences.sentence: "kept from her housework by gabby neighbors"

means.word_mean: 3. friendly and open and willing to talk;

auth_sentence.content: She is naturally 'talkative' and purrs a lot affectionately.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is naturally 'talkative' and purrs a lot affectionately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is naturally 'talkative' and purrs a lot affectionately.

auth_sentence.content: So why are affluent parents more talkative than down-and-out ones?
auth_sentence.res_content: So why are affluent parents more talkative than down-and-out ones?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So why are affluent parents more talkative than down-and-out ones?

auth_sentence.content: The professors, having no classes, were available and talkative.
auth_sentence.res_content: The professors, having no classes, were available and talkative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The professors, having no classes, were available and talkative.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……倾向(性质)的;……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或物等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: affirm肯定+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赞成的,肯定的
argument争论+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.爱争论的,好辩论的
authority权威,威信+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.权威性的,命令式的
e出+voc喊+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→把感情喊出来
figu形体,用形象比喻+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.比喻的,借喻的
lucr钱+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赚钱的,有利可图的
represent代表+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.典型的,有代表性的
talk讲话+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.罗嗦的
preserve保存+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.防腐的,防腐剂
sed坐+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.[药物]镇静的,镇静剂
represent描述,表示+ative人或物等→n.代表

means.word_mean: 健谈的;多嘴的;喜欢说话的

sentences.en: He is talkative when he has a few drinks under his belt.
sentences.cn: 他几杯酒下肚话就多了。
她是个活泼爱说话的人。

sentences.en: People began forming into little talkative groups.
sentences.cn: 人们开始一组一组地聚在一起议论。

sentences.en: She winked a warning to the talkative boy.
sentences.cn: 她向那个多嘴的男孩使了一个表示警告的眼色。

sentences.en: Mary was sometimes overshadowed by the more talkative members of the family.
sentences.cn: 有时家中更健谈的人使玛丽显得黯然失色。
